data.title: Neo-Nazi and National Front organiser quits movement, comes out as gay, opens up about Jewish heritage
Maltese journalist's son says she was murdered for exposing corruption
Russian 'Troll Factory' spent $2.3 million undermining U.S. elections
Netanyahu's Government Is Trying To Ban Police Investigations Of Prime Ministers
Viking textile did not feature word 'Allah'. Medieval Islamic art and archaeology professor Stephennie Mulder disputes the findings, saying the inscription has 'no Arabic at all'
FBI uncovered Russian bribery plot before Obama administration approved controversial nuclear deal with Moscow

Turkish spies reportedly betraying defectors in German immigration offices - Officials working in Germany's immigration authorities pass on information about Turkish asylum seekers to the Ankara government, according to press reports. Turkish spies may have infiltrated German authorities.

Blood transfusions from women who have been pregnant may be lethal to men, study suggests: '...antibodies acquired by women during pregnancy to protect the baby may trigger reactions in men which could prove fatal.'
US judge blocks latest Trump travel restrictions to the US from eight countries
Catalonia independence leaders jailed in Spain
Bomb kills reporter who covered Malta’s ‘Panama Papers’ link
Netherlands is planning to end all its coal power by 2030 - Dutch government also announced plans to ban all petrol and diesel-powered cars by the same year.
Russia proposes punishing schools and parents if kids go to rallies amid anti-Putin protests
Gulf of Mexico Oil Spill May Be Largest Since BP Disaster
Anger as Chinese media claim harassment is just a western problem. State newspaper says China does not have Harvey Weinstein-type predators because ‘men are taught to be protective of women’.
